title: Wines of Huneeus Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, September 10, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting featuring the celebrated Wines of Huneeus. This lineup highlights some of their most acclaimed labels, from bold Cabernet to elegant Chardonnay and Pinot Noir.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Faust Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 92 pts James Suckling, 90 pts Wine Advocate – Bold and powerful with cherry, raspberry, blueberry, dried herbs, and smooth tannins.

• Flowers Sonoma Coast Chardonnay 2023 – 96 pts Jeb Dunnuck, 94 pts James Suckling, 93 pts Wine Spectator – Bright and elegant with citrus, green apple, honeysuckle, and electric minerality.

• Leviathan Red Blend 2022 – 92 pts Wine Advocate, 91 pts Jeb Dunnuck – Full-bodied and fruit-forward with black cherry, cassis, cedar, and refined tannins.

• Benton Lane Pinot Noir 2023 – Vibrant and complex with red fruit, blueberry, savory herbs, violets, and a fresh, lingering finish.

Discover the depth and variety of the Huneeus portfolio—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
